text: Luke Robinson (born 6 August 1990), better known as Luke Blackledge, is an English professional boxer. He held the Commonwealth super-middleweight title from 2015 to 2016 and challenged once for the British super-middleweight title in 2016. Upon turning professional, he changed his name from Robinson to Blackledge in order to avoid confusion with another English boxer of the same name. ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable"
